item.title: Frames not appearing
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“TheMyth, post:1, topic:239146”]Hi, im using delta source and my problem is this. im trying to add a countdown frame for a fight pits room, ive already got the working countdown and teles ext, i just cant get the countdown to appear at the top of my scr, heres my code:

public boolean PITStimer() { if((absX >= 2404 && absX <= 2394 && absY >= 5175 && absY <= 5169)) { sendFrame126(+PlayerHandler.pitsWaitTimer+" till next game starts.", 6570); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); return true; }else{ return false; } }

help appriciated thanks.[/quote]

Did you put it in process?

Read full topic

item.title: Frames not appearing

Hi, im using delta source and my problem is this. im trying to add a countdown frame for a fight pits room, ive already got the working countdown and teles ext, i just cant get the countdown to appear at the top of my scr, heres my code:

public boolean PITStimer() { if((absX >= 2404 && absX <= 2394 && absY >= 5175 && absY <= 5169)) { sendFrame126(+PlayerHandler.pitsWaitTimer+" till next game starts.", 6570); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); return true; }else{ return false; } }
